coded_answer.p: I'm Omadar, a spanishSpanish male of eighteen years old who is spending in this town a weekweek's holidaya week's holiday in this town. I decided to enjoygo to a play at the theatre of wichwhich you're the manager to see the "London's newest and best musical show." My opinion?

After a boring play, I decided to go to anthe theatre restaurant, but uncertainlypeculiarly it was closed. I decided to go home and preparemake some sandwiches.
